About Notion

Notion is a comprehensive workspace that combines note-taking, task management, databases, and wikis. It's perfect for personal use and team collaboration.

Key Features

  • Rich text editor with markdown support
  • Database and spreadsheet views
  • Task and project management
  • Real-time collaboration
  • Templates for various use cases
  • Mobile and desktop apps

Available Platforms

  • Web
  • Windows
  • macOS
  • iOS
  • Android

Pricing

Free tier available, Premium from $8/month
